title: В гостях у деда-краеведа
overview: Is it possible to walk around all of Russia and get acquainted with the life of each nation? Perhaps this is within the power of one Grandfather-Regionalist named Ignat Matveevich. He has lived in this world for so long that he has been able to visit almost every city in our unique country. Today he is ready to tell all TV viewers about his adventures.The stories of Grandfather-Regionalist include the nature of Russian regions, so diverse and amazing, and the brightest cultural traditions of the peoples, and of course a local fairy tale!
